title: The Most Favorite Champion of All Time [Voting Elimination] - Group H
body:
**UPDATE:**
**
I MADE A MISTAKE, THIS IS GROUP H:D Sorry for confusion!**:D First of all, last Group Winners are: **Bard** (248 votes) and **Sion** (63 votes). Bard just destroyed everything in his sight and Sion secured his ticket after hard fight with Vel´Koz. Well, lets go to Group I. **LET THE BEST WIN**.

Also please check out my [YouTube Channel](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCMVxkqVcf2KPo8dYfRcchJA). Thanks for every support!:)

**BASIC INFO:**

Hello,

who is your favorite champion? And who is the most favorite champion of all 137 champions? Let´s find out! I´ve created a bracked of all champions currently in the game. It will be up to you guys to decide who is the BEST champion. 

The **voting will last for 2 days**, then **2 champions with the most votes will make it to next round** and I will create another voting thread for Group H and so on, until there is only 1 winner.

The full Bracked can be found on my [FaceBook](https://www.facebook.com/RazyeLx) / [Twitter](https://twitter.com/RazyeLxGaming) or down below on the next link:

[http://imgur.com/CrCrLl4](http://imgur.com/CrCrLl4)

So lets get to it. Here are the 9 champions. Vote for your most favorite. Only 2 will make it to next round!:) You don´t have your favorite here? Then vote for the one you like the most:)

If you have any questions, just ask:)

PS: Only votes on this thread count. I won´t count any comments/votes on other pages, forums, etc.
PSS: I use this Board, bcs I can´t post to General discussion, its bugged.
PSSS: You can find results of:
- Group A [HERE](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/PizTEHPg-the-most-favorite-champion-of-all-time-voting-elimination-group-a)
- Group B [HERE](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/qAj5uFam-the-most-favorite-champion-of-all-time-voting-elimination-group-b)
- Group C [HERE](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/BsWOFBMZ-the-most-favorite-champion-of-all-time-voting-elimination-group-c)
- Group D [HERE
](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/JnLEbNX9-the-most-favorite-champion-of-all-time-voting-elimination-group-d)
- Group E [HERE](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/as4Kgdq0-the-most-favorite-champion-of-all-time-voting-elimination-group-e)
- Group F [HERE](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/crhoY6m7-the-most-favorite-champion-of-all-time-voting-elimination-group-f)
- Group G [HERE](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/ALeEXAGa-the-most-favorite-champion-of-all-time-voting-elimination-group-g)

RazyeLx

Yes!!!

bird nation
Why are half of my favourite champions in one group? Whom should I be voting for in the other groups?!
VOTE TALIYAHHHHHHHHH

Alright, the voting is now **CLOSED** with total of 697 votes. The winners of Group H are: {{champion:268}} Azir with 181 votes and {{champion:92}} Riven with 134 votes. I will now update the bracket and create Group I. Be right Back.

**Results:**

tbh if you didnt vote for ezreal
then you belong in a museum

how about no
oh good you give all the toxic riven mains power to vote good job

https://youtu.be/QXLqMB6vBic
It's actually impossible for Ryze to lose, because he can just Q>E>Q>W>Q>E>Q and everyone else will die

Hail riven

It's all skill.
VOTE 4 DAT JANX

by the way I enjoy being critted 5 times in a row with 35% crit chance.
